Function reference

All functions

add_rubric_item()
Prompts grader to add a rubric item for the current question
assign_grade_write_feedback()
Writes feedback, and returns grade, grade decomposition, and grading status
assist_grading() assist_team_grading() assist_advanced_grading()
Assisted grading
assist_regrading()
Assists with regrading, given assist_grading() or assist_advanced_grading() was previously used
core_assist_grading()
Core function that assists with grading, creates feedback and grade book files
create_final_grade_sheet()
Writes final grade sheet csv
create_issues_github()
Push issues to GitHub
create_rubric_prompts()
Creates assignment rubric prompts
create_rubric_template()
Creates rubric template csv file
create_temp_grade_sheet()
Prepares temporary grade sheet for gradetools internal use
delete_feedback_grade()
Delete feedback and grades for specified students and questions
grade_student()
Leads grader through grading a student
import_rubric()
Reads in assignment rubric to produce rubric_list. Alternative to defining rubric as rubric_list manually
push_feedback_github()
Push feedback to GitHub
push_to_github()
Push feedback and issues to GitHub
request_github_issues()
Allows the user to input their requested GitHub issues titles and bodies

Developed by Federica Zoe Ricci, Catalina Medina, Mine Dogucu.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.2.
